listen here, Plintissa brought that stuff in her ship, i never saw no posts
with bombs, and Suukie lasts long, he's starting a metamorphisis as he
recieves more and more damage, i plan to change him and he needs more
damage......i haven't moded through that whole part, it was you who was
moding....sheesh, and i can have the Rock with i want.....nothing wrong with
bots that watched too much TV......
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, May 26, 2000 6:21 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> TheCode, I'm interested in knowing how Suukie mysteriously repaired
himself.
> And how that matter, with the amount of mech-fluid he was leaking, even
made
> it out of the Ark?  And, if it was by getting to Plintissa's "CR Chamber",
> I'd have to say...please stop moding already.  Gosh, you make me wanna
kick
> the crap out of someone.  A CR takes energy.  A base takes energy.  How
does
> Plintissa even know how to build one?  I'm sure it's a complicated
process.
> Where the Hell did she get the Cybertronian components from on Past Earth,
> where the wheel hasn't even been invented.  How did she get all the scrap
> metal?  Where is she getting the energy to power the CR Chamber?  Think
> before you post, god.  And another thing, you never posted for the charge
> Ramhorn tossed into the bridge set to explode in five seconds.  Did
Suukie,
> with all his wounds, mystically get out of the bridge via teleportation?
I'm
> really ticked, and now you're bringing in the rock?  I have to agree with
> Talon, that is a dumb idea.  That ruins the entire thing.  I'm willing to
> take this up with Yanshosh/Zardus (and the Council), but you are driving
my
> patience, and I'm you're doing the same to a lot of other people, with
your
> whole "destroy the Ark's defenses, steal the Autobot/Decepticon bodies, go
> into an underground base which you made lickety split in a few seconds".
> That is moding.  You even admitted to moding, on purpose, so no one could
> ruin it.  That's part of the RPG, TheCode, everyone participates.
>
>
>
> Stinkbomb/Ramhorn:
>
